casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harvey Lee GRADY 250P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Craig M. Cooley, Attorney at Law, for Grady, Harvey Lee. Ashish K. Sharda, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jon David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of August 2018 by Defendant in the Alternative to Deem Petition for Discretionary Review a Petition for Writ of Certioarari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
